docs.lead_paragraph: Tina Turnbow is a professional makeup artist who is known for lending her celebrity clients editorial polish.
docs.abstract: The makeup artist Tina Turnbow asks Ivanka Trump how her pregnancy has affected her beauty regimen.
docs.snippet: The makeup artist Tina Turnbow asks Ivanka Trump how her pregnancy has affected her beauty regimen.

docs.lead_paragraph: THE NEWS Private Eye, a British magazine, said Julian Assange, the founder of WikiLeaks, called its editor to complain that the magazine had joined a ''Jewish conspiracy'' bent on smearing his organization. BEHIND THE NEWS When the Private Eye editor told Mr. Assange that the plot's supposed ringleader, Alan Rusbridger, editor of The Guardian, was not Jewish, Mr. Assange reportedly said he was ''sort of Jewish'' because he had a Jewish brother-in-law, then said, ''Forget the Jewish thing.'' Mr. Assange said the Private Eye report was another smear.

docs.lead_paragraph: Here's a task for Bill Clinton, George H.W. Bush and their well-mannered minions at the University of Arizona's new National Institute for Civil Discourse: Is it uncivil when someone implicitly compares someone else to Hitler, Stalin and Hosni Mubarak, but then says he is, of course, not comparing anybody to Hitler, Stalin or Hosni Mubarak?
docs.abstract: A week of Hitler comparisons and other rough partisan talk showed the futility of the post-Tucson "civility" discussion.
docs.snippet: A week of Hitler comparisons and other rough partisan talk showed the futility of the post-Tucson "civility" discussion.

docs.lead_paragraph: 2:42 p.m. | Updated Mike Huckabee, the former governor of Arkansas and a potential 2012 presidential candidate, has been getting lots of press recently for his comments on radio shows. The latest? This week, he went after the Hollywood star Natalie Portman.

headline.main: Huckabee Slams Natalie Portman For Out-of-Wedlock Pregnancy

docs.abstract: Mike Huckabee, the former governor of Arkansas and a potential 2012 presidential candidate, went after the actress Natalie Portman for getting pregnant before she was married.
docs.snippet: Mike Huckabee, the former governor of Arkansas and a potential 2012 presidential candidate, went after the actress Natalie Portman for getting pregnant before she was married.

docs.lead_paragraph: FRIDAY'S PUZZLE - Please make sure you're seated both securely and comfortably before reading today's post. Place your hands on the armrests, if you have them, and grip firmly. Remember to keep breathing at all times.

Periodically when I write about miscarriage on Motherlode, a debate breaks out in the comments between those who see losing a pregnancy as a lasting tragedy in their lives and those who wonder why those women can't see the loss as "nature's way" and move on.
docs.abstract: Aftereffects that can last for years.

docs.lead_paragraph: A bill passed by the City Council would require more transparency from crisis pregnancy centers that critics say present themselves as medical clinics.
